body: Gold counters from Aurification doesn't displayed on creatures they put on.
author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)
title: Show all counter types in graphics mode

comments.body:
The gold counters and quite a few other icons are only shown in text mode. I know this is far from ideal and I'll have a look at showing more icons in graphics mode.

It's not a bug though so I'll change this into an enhancement request.

**Summary:** Show all counter types in graphics mode  
  **Labels:** -Type-Defect Type-Enhancement
